workshop.title: Oracle GoldenGate Microservices Architecture Hands-On Workshop
workshop.description: These labs will give you a basic understanding of the Oracle GoldenGate Microservices Architecture and many of the capabilities around administration and replication configuration.  The labs will walk you through creating multiple topologies with different use-case(s).  You will explore some common use cases for moving your data from Oracle to Oracle, bi-directional and heterogeneous databases.

versions.name: Hands-On Labs
versions.description: An in-person workshop with an Oracle instructor

versions.name: Download Presentation
versions.description: Introduction and Overview of Oracle GoldenGate Microservices Architecture

labs.title: Install GG Microservices Architecture
labs.description: Install the Oracle GoldenGate Microservces for Oracle in the target environment using the Oracle Universal Installer (OUI) tool.

labs.title: Lab 200: Cloud Migration
labs.description: Explore some common use cases for moving your data from on-premise to the cloud

labs.title: Lab 300: DBCS Maintenance
labs.description: Perform some common DBA tasks such as setting up security access and scaling out your instance.

labs.title: Lab 400: CLI/Curl Commands (Programatic Control of Services)
labs.description: Review 'get' and 'put' curl commands to monitor and control DBCS cloud services
